blocks.name: ressplusf
blocks.content: The group operation function ` +f ` of a structure's restriction is the operation function's restriction to the new base. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ressplusf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cplusf, c0), cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c4, cress, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c4))
  -| wfn(c1, cxp(c3, c3))
  -| wss(c2, c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4ri(cfv(cplusf, c0), cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), cxp(c2, c2)), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  mp2an(wceq(cres(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))), cxp(c2, c2)), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c2, c2, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c3))
  resmpt2(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c2, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))
  reseq1i(c1, cxp(c2, c2), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))))
  mpbi(wceq(c1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c3, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)))), wfn(c1, cxp(c3, c3)))
  fnov(hs0, hs1, c1, c3, c3)
  plusffval(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusf, c0), c2, c1, c0)
  ax-mp(wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)), wss(c2, c3))
  ressbas2(c2, c3, c0, c4)
  eqtri(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c4))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cplusg, c4), cfv(cplusg, c0)), wcel(c2, universe))
  ssexi(c2, c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c4)
  ressplusg(c2, universe, cfv(cplusg, c4), c0, c4)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cplusf, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ressplusf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (+f ` c0)=(c1 |`(c2 √ó c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c4[|`s]c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c1[Fn](c3 √ó c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚äÜ c3
} = {
  3eqtr4ri((+f ` c0), (c1 |`(c2 √ó c2)), ((hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c1]hs1))|`(c2 √ó c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c1]hs1)))
  mp2an(((hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c1]hs1))|`(c2 √ó c2))=(hs0 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c1]hs1)), c2 ‚äÜ c3, c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  resmpt2(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c2, c3, (hs0[c1]hs1))
  reseq1i(c1, (c2 √ó c2), (hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c1]hs1)))
  mpbi(c1 =(hs0 ‚àà c3, hs1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c1]hs1)), c1[Fn](c3 √ó c3))
  fnov(hs0, hs1, c1, c3, c3)
  plusffval(hs0, hs1, (+f ` c0), c2, c1, c0)
  ax-mp(c2 =(Base ` c0), c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  ressbas2(c2, c3, c0, c4)
  eqtri(c1, (+ ` c0), (+ ` c4))
  ax-mp((+ ` c4)=(+ ` c0), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssexi(c2, c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c4)
  ressplusg(c2, universe, (+ ` c4), c0, c4)
  eqid((+ ` c4))
  eqid((+f ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: ressnm
blocks.content: The norm in a restricted structure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ressnm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wceq(cres(c4, c2), cfv(cnm, c5)))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c0, cress, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnm, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cres(c4, c2), cfv(cnm, c5), cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c0), c1)), cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c5), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c5), cfv(c0g, c5))), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
  mpteq12dv(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c0), c1), cfv(cbs, c5), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c5), cfv(c0g, c5)), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  ressbas2(c2, c3, c5, c0)
  oveq123d(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c0), c1, cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c5), cfv(c0g, c5), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cds, c5)))
  syl(wss(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(cds, c0), cfv(cds, c5)), wcel(c2, universe))
  ssex(c2, c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  ressds(c2, universe, cfv(cds, c0), c5, c0)
  eqidd(cv(hs0), w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
  ress0g(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3), wceq(cres(c4, c2), cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c0), c1))))
  syl5eq(cres(c4, c2), cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c0), c1)), cres(cmpt(hs0, c3, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c0), c1)), c2), wss(c2, c3))
  reseq1i(c4, c2, cmpt(hs0, c3, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c0), c1)))
  nmfval(hs0, c4, c3, cfv(cds, c0), c1, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cds, c0))
  resmpt(hs0, c2, c3, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c0), c1))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(cnm, c5), cmpt(hs0, cfv(cbs, c5), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cds, c5), cfv(c0g, c5)))))
  nmfval(hs0, cfv(cnm, c5), cfv(cbs, c5), cfv(cds, c5), cfv(c0g, c5), c5)
  eqid(cfv(cnm, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c5))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c5))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cds, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c5))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cds, c5))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c5))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ressnm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3)‚Üí(c4 |` c2)=(norm ` c5))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c0[|`s]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(norm ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((c4 |` c2), (norm ` c5), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c0)]c1)), (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c5)‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c5)](0 ` c5))), (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3))
  mpteq12dv(hs0, c2, (hs0[(dist ` c0)]c1), (Base ` c5), (hs0[(dist ` c5)](0 ` c5)), (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà Mnd, c1 ‚àà c2, c2 ‚äÜ c3, c2 =(Base ` c5))
  ressbas2(c2, c3, c5, c0)
  oveq123d(hs0, (dist ` c0), c1, hs0, (dist ` c5), (0 ` c5), (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà Mnd, c1 ‚àà c2, c2 ‚äÜ c3, (dist ` c0)=(dist ` c5))
  syl(c2 ‚äÜ c3, (dist ` c0)=(dist ` c5), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssex(c2, c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  ressds(c2, universe, (dist ` c0), c5, c0)
  eqidd(hs0, (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3))
  ress0g(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà Mnd, c1 ‚àà c2, c2 ‚äÜ c3, (c4 |` c2)=(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c0)]c1)))
  syl5eq((c4 |` c2), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c0)]c1)), ((hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c0)]c1))|` c2), c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  reseq1i(c4, c2, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c0)]c1)))
  nmfval(hs0, c4, c3, (dist ` c0), c1, c0)
  eqid((dist ` c0))
  resmpt(hs0, c2, c3, (hs0[(dist ` c0)]c1))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3), (norm ` c5)=(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c5)‚Ü¶(hs0[(dist ` c5)](0 ` c5))))
  nmfval(hs0, (norm ` c5), (Base ` c5), (dist ` c5), (0 ` c5), c5)
  eqid((norm ` c5))
  eqid((Base ` c5))
  eqid((0 ` c5))
  eqid((dist ` c5))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((dist ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c5))
  diff.hs0.c((dist ` c5))
  diff.hs0.c((0 ` c5))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

blocks.name: abvpropd2
blocks.content: Weaker version of ~ abvpropd . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm abvpropd2(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cabv, c0), cfv(cabv, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, c1)))
} = {
  abvpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, c1), w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm abvpropd2(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(AbsVal ` c0)=(AbsVal ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(+ ` c0)=(+ ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(√ó ` c0)=(√ó ` c1))
} = {
  abvpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, (Base ` c0), w0)
  eqidd((Base ` c0), w0)
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c0), (+ ` c1), w0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (√ó ` c0), (√ó ` c1), w0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}
